| HistoryText             = Former [[Union of Soviet Socialist Republics|Soviet]] spy, the [[Andre Rostov (Earth-616)|Red Barbarian (Andre Rostov)]], recruited a team of former Soviet agents and [[Russians|Russian]] [[Homo superior|Mutants]], some via duplicitous means, in order to strike out against the [[United States of America|United States]]. 

The first mission the Neo-Soviets accomplished was to steal [[Anthony Stark (Earth-616)|Tony Stark's]] entire armory of [[Iron Man Armor|Iron Man Armors]]. The group then used the armors to attack [[Fort Knox]] and [[Washington, D.C.]], retrieve the body of Mutant serial killer [[Arkady Rossovich (Earth-616)|Omega Red]], and to capture Tony Stark himself. 

Realizing the true nature of the team and horrified at Rostov's treatment of the team's agents, such as sacrificing them to revive Omega Red, [[Laynia Petrovna (Earth-616)|Darkstar (Laynia Petrovna)]] betrayed him, freeing Tony Stark and holding off Omega Red as Stark fought Rostov. Rostov seemingly died when he self-destructed the [[Hulkbuster Armor]] he had been wearing for the fight.
